Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
SenderFolderMinMessagesCount_Description: If sender has sent less messages than this number their messages will appear in the 'Rest mail' virtual folder
SystemFoldersToExclude_Description: List of folder types to exclude. Possible values: 1 - Inbox, 2 - Sent, 3 - Drafts, 4 - Spam, 5 - Trash, 6 - Virus
